website_summaries.verdict: A basic charging station that accommodates up to 4 Joy-Cons.
pros: This simple charging station is officially licensed by Nintendo and charges up to 4 Joy-Cons, which can slide into the base the same way they attach to the Switch
The station is powered by USB and can plug directly into the Switch dock
cons: Some customers experienced issues with the indicator lights

customer_reviews.title: The lights we're on but nobody's ohm!
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for the first 3 months and then it just died on the right side. Now only the left joy- con controllers will charge. The lights don't come on anymore on that side. At first, the back left side broke. This is whereI prefer a brick and mortar store, I could bring it back and exchange it. Now i'm just out on the $$
customer_reviews.author: Brian J. Moran

customer_reviews.title: Lasted almost 2 months...
customer_reviews.text: Lasted almost 2 months and an led went out. Can't tell if the controller is recharging anymore. Disappointed in PowerA, usually their products last longer than this. Maybe a dud, maybe not. Last day to send it it back was June 2, so it lasted 22 days after return date.
customer_reviews.author: Trebor Z

customer_reviews.title: Perfect match for the Switch
customer_reviews.text: Unlike most of the other options, this is an "official" Nintendo product and it looks and feels like quality. I originally went with another product that has transparent bars that light up but it seemed flimsy and the bars are way too bright, enough to light up Cell Block B, and are on all the time regardless of if anything is plugged into them. The PowerA one gives you red when charging, green when 100% and off when you have nothing plugged in and the LEDs aren't bright enough to be noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: LLWarrenP

customer_reviews.title: Solid value
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good charger, and it works well. The build quality is excellent, and it does what it is supposed to. I removed a star because it does change from green status lights (fully charged JoyCons) to red (charging JoyCons) when you dock the Switch. This would only be a problem for those using the Switch dock as the usb power source, but it does worry me that the charger may be overcharging my JoyCons, which seems bad for the batteries. I am not the only reviewer to note this, but so far no problems, though.
customer_reviews.author: Brent J

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Charger!
customer_reviews.text: I loved that this plugs in by USB to charge the Joy-Con controllers. Being able to charge four Joy-Cons at a time is excellent and makes it easier to always have enough charged controllers to have a large group of people play a game such as Mario Kart 8. Storing this to take it on the go can sometimes get a little annoying due to the way you have to wrap the cord very precisely on the bottom of the charger, but I have not had too much issue with that so far.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Campbell

customer_reviews.title: much needed to support 4 player action, usb charging is nice to avoid another wall outlet plug
customer_reviews.text: After having my kids and their cousins have to take turns using 2 controllers to play Mario Kart, we finally decided we needed 4 controllers. This also almost made it a necessity to have the capability of charging them all at once too. Saw that Nintendo had a solution for this that looked perfect, ordered it, and has worked well for us. Plugs into USB, which is perfect for us as we have an Anker multiple USB port charger in our AV stand.
customer_reviews.author: d808Top Contributor: Pokémon

customer_reviews.title: 0 Stars. Green means go, right? (mmmmmmnope)
customer_reviews.text: I’d love to give 0 stars. This thing lit up green to tell me my joy cons were finished charging. So I took two off and pressed l/r and NOTHING. Tried the other set. The same thing happened. Then I slid them back on the charger and the lights were red. After a while, the chargers lights turned green again and I tried again. Same result. Tried this 4 times already and NOTHING. Piece of utter junk.
customer_reviews.author: Alie K

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy to slide Joy-Cons on and off.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, even if you only have two Joy-Cons. It makes it so much easier to grab them if you primarily have your Switch in the dock and hooked up to a TV. The weighted base is very nice, helps keep it in place. The fact that it's USB-powered is very convenient, as it can plug right into the Switch dock's USB port. The status LEDs are clearly visible, but not annoyingly bright. Just the right amount of subtlety. It's a great addition to your Switch. Very nice to have Joy-Cons always charged and ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: mindleak

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping the controllers charged and out of the way
customer_reviews.text: Rather than fumble with attaching the controllers to the Switch to charge them, this dock lets you take advantage of the USB cable and charge them out of the way. Now we can grab whichever controllers we need and not have to remove the Switch from the dock, remove the controllers while pressing every button we didn't want to press, then undo all that before we can start playing. The fact you can charge all 4 at once is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: don't have to take turns to charge anymore
customer_reviews.text: I play my Nintendo Switch with my GF on TV a lot and we both uses the Joy-Con Grip when we play. So when the battery runs low, we will have to take turns to charge it on the Switch itself. Now with this Charging Dock, we both can charge our controller at the same time, so we won't have to stop the game because one of our controller is out of battery. We get to enjoy our games without interruption due to low battery anymore. It does cut off power when it finished charging from the light showing Red to Green when it is fully charge.
customer_reviews.author: H. Tsang

customer_reviews.title: Good to have, very short usb cord
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, but the cord is very short (~3ft is my guess). Also, this is designed to be plugged into any existing, powered device with an available usb port (like the switch dock), it does not come with a power supply of it's own. This is fine with me, as I have more than enough lying around the house, but definitely somethig to consider.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M

customer_reviews.title: Very Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a product that would keep my Joy-Cons charged and ready to go whenever I need them. I found this product and it is made of really high-quality plastic. It has a weighted bottom so it doesn't tip over and feels really nice. The USB plugs right into the TV dock for your switch. The only thing I found was that it does charge the Joy-Cons at a slower rate. It takes a couple of hours to go from 0% to 100%. I really like the indicator LED lights for each controller. Other than that it is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Connor K.

customer_reviews.title: Very useful for more than 2 joy-cons or permanently docked Switches....
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I keep it next to the dock and plugged into the dock so I can just put the controllers away on it all the time. There are LEDs on the top to indicate when it is done charging (green is done, red is still charging). Works great if you have 4 controllers and want to charge them all at the same time instead of through the Switch itself, or want to store the Switch separately / without the joy-cons.
customer_reviews.author: Quinton Aj Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Not officially licensed Scam
customer_reviews.text: The product we received today is not a Product A product and therefore this is not licensed by Nintendo. This is a scam. Heard from the seller today they said that the product description says that this is not a PowerA product and it doesn’t match the picture. That’s not true this is listed as a PowerA product but they are sending MIMD docks. Do not buy this is a scam!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Joy-Con Charger
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to have a method for charging multiple joy-cons at once, so decided to purchase this charger. It’s super easy to use, connects easily via USB to the Switch, the controllers slide on and off super easily, and the LED lights are great for letting me know when a controller is charged. I haven’t had any issues with the controllers not charging or the lights not working. Overall, I am really happy with this purchase and would definitely recommend this charger.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: A great way to charge your joy cons!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for charging your joy cons and will be very useful with some of the upcoming games like Mario Party which will rely heavily on joy con use for mulltiplayer. Just be warned this does not come with a power adapter and is just a USB plug which is meant to be plugged into your nintendo switch dock for charging. I would recommend using an adapter you already have separately for ease of use such as a phone adapter to just plug the USB in and charge the device. The device works well and has a clean look while not taking up a huge amount of space.
customer_reviews.author: ItsMe

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: This works really well for the purpose it serves. My only complaint about it sometimes one of the charging ports will stay red (indicating it is not charged all the way) while the others will go green, even after being on the charger overnight. I am not sure yet if this is a problem with the device or my controller because I haven't kept a close eye on it to remember which port is doing this. I plugged it into the USB port on the Switch Dock and it seems to do the trick. Really like the cable management feature on the bottom of this charging doc it for the excess cable.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Great charging stand!
customer_reviews.text: I love the convenience of being able to charge all four joycon remotes at the same time. It's just become standard practice to dock when not in use so they're always fully charged and ready to go. The cable stores underneath and we have it plugged in directly to the Swtich. Only issue... the first one I received would not charge the one port (3 of 4 worked) but I returned/exchanged it and the new one works great! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: b.g.

customer_reviews.title: If You Own More Than One Pair Of Joy-Cons, This is a No Brainer
customer_reviews.text: If you are like me, you probably own more than the original pair of Joy-Cons that came with your Switch. If that is the case, this product is perfect you you. When you have friends over, there is no bigger bummer than having a pair of Joy-Cons that are low on battery, dropping one if not two friends out of the fun. With this dock, I keep my spare Joy-Cons docked and charging. So when your friends show up for some multi-player fun, those Joy-Cons are hot off the charger, fully charged and ready to play. What more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: CrayfishAndy

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine for spare joycons
customer_reviews.text: Charges work fine. Seems like it may be a bit slow but I don’t mind because I don’t use many pairs of joycons at once. Really enjoy how simple it looks and it displays the joycons great. I plug it in to the side of my dock and have it in front of my TV stand. Sometimes the LEDs change from green to red and then back, which makes me feel like it may be a bit unreliable. Sliding in the joycons feels like there is a bit of friction but it’s not really an issue. Usually I charge my main pairs directly on my docked switch, which I trust more.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: necessity if you have more than 2 joy cons
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I bought an extra pair of joy cons so that we can either have 4-player games or so 2 players can have a better experience/grip than using a single one. It didn't take long to realize it's not convenient to charge them on the Switch console 1 pair at a time. No problems using it and provides a nice place to store the controllers as well, I just unplug it so they're not sitting on a charge 24/7.
customer_reviews.author: giants68

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: This product works great and charges all of the controllers at the same time. The only thing that is throwing me off is that the lights always show red and do not light up green when fully charged. I am not sure if they are supposed to do this but for a split second when taking them out a green light comes on. Other than that this charger does what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: funnyshake

customer_reviews.title: which is nice. But its also a drawback at night because ...
customer_reviews.text: Green lights on the top tell you if the controllers are fully charged, which is nice. But its also a drawback at night because it's quite bright if you sleep in the same room as it. I ended up putting a game case over it to hide the light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Charger for multiple Joy-cons
customer_reviews.text: This product is really good and it is working perfectly so far. I like that you are able to use the Joy-cons even when you are charging them. Nonetheless, I found it not so important because the Nintendo Switch Dock already charges connected Joy-cons. This product is really helpful if you have several couple of Joy-cons. If you own a Pro Controller, it would be better if you pick the one with space for Joy-cons and Pro Controller. This product is really good, but not a must have if you are not planning on getting more Joy-cons.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Romero

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have enjoyed our switch, and this item has been a tremendous help. We often had issues where our switch gets knocked out of the dock when we try to grab the joy-cons, and this item solves that problem easily. When our friends or family come over we can also charge their joy-cons at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Scot G Russian

customer_reviews.title: Must Have for Nintendo Switch!
customer_reviews.text: This device is PERFECT for always having a convenient docking station for the Switch remotes - it charges (duh) but is also a spacesaver and a sleek design that make this a must-have for Switch owners. The charge time is maybe 2-hours, but honestly, since I always have my controllers either docked here or on the Switch adapter, I am never having dead controllers.
customer_reviews.author: rreyna20

customer_reviews.title: Great for four controllers.
customer_reviews.text: This works excellently. The lights on top to indicate charge status are helpful. The quality is very good, no cheap feeling here. Load up the controllers when they go low. This is best if you have all four controllers to load it up with, orherwise use the console instead.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Very useful charging accessory if you have multiple sets of Joy-Cons
customer_reviews.text: This eliminates the need to keep the Joy-Cons attached to the console for charging. You can charge 2 sets of controllers with this. The USB end plugs right into the Switch charging dock, so there is no need for additional power supply. There is a helpful green light/red light indicator for each controller. You can just keep rotating them and never have to worry about dead controllers.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Charges Really Fast!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after buying a pair of extra controllers! I had a few hiccups of no delivery and then accidentally received a portable charger instead (used double AA batteries and only could charge two instead of four). After finally getting, them are amazing! I use the dock overnight for all four of my controllers and then let a pair charge while playing on my TV, so I can switch out if a pair dies. The charge light is really nice as well. Not a huge fan of the USB charging cable, since you'll need one of those cubes, but not a big deal breaker for the quality of this dock.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Dominy

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done but when jostled slightly the charge ...
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done but when jostled slightly the charge indication lights flicker from Green to red, creating the appearance of electrical issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does its job and does it well.
customer_reviews.text: This charging dock works insanely well. I like to let my controllers get to the point where they’ll turn off (out of fear for overcharging the battery), and this dock charged my Joy-Cons very quickly. We went from 0% to 100% power in about 30 to 40 minutes. So needless to say, I’m very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mashers90

customer_reviews.title: A must if you have multiple JoyCons!
customer_reviews.text: It is a really nice charging station to have when you have multiple Joy Cons, The only downside is the charging cable is a USB cable only and is 3" Long but i use it on my PC desk and plug it into my PC case but if you were to have it on top of a entertainment center it would need to be right next to your power outlet or strip. Also it displays on top of the charging station to put the Joycons in a certain way but if you do that it makes it impossible to press the release button on them, so i put the joycons in so the release button is facing outward.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas S.

customer_reviews.title: No wall plug
customer_reviews.text: A decent charger but big complaint: they don't provide an adapter to plug it into the wall. Sure, you can plug it in to your Switch. But if you want to plug it into the wall, you have to provide your own adapter for that. I used a spare iPhone wall plug and it works find. But they really should have provided a way to plug this into the wall.
customer_reviews.author: J. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Good charger
customer_reviews.text: Had this charger for a while now and it works very well. all four docks still charge no issues. Very handy when you want to charge your joycons and you don't want to put them on and off from your docked switch all the time.
customer_reviews.author: SomeRandomDude

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes works, sometimes doesn’t.
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for a couple months and then the lights started going out, flickering, or just not turning on at all. If I bump it, it sometimes start working again, but there is no way to gauge its effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed to charge my 4 joycons. I recently got mario party and realized you can only use joycon controllers to play. I had to buy a second set so I could play with friends. This allows you to charge all 4 at one time which is a lot better than charging 2 on the switch then swapping them out when full. Would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Irishboy

customer_reviews.title: solid way to have your joycons organized
customer_reviews.text: i don't know anything about game consoles, and someone told me i can connect joycons to my macbook to do flashcards. so i just bought the joycones from amazon separately, thinking they will come with a charger. They DON'T. You need this for joycons, if you are trying to use them for a similar purpose as mine.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn K.

customer_reviews.title: Broken nintendo charger  for switch
customer_reviews.text: The left side stop working within 2 weeks so getting another ship out I was kinda mad being it was a real switch product I should got new one and money back but I waiting on one the one I got is coming 9 thru the 18th but first one I got it was two days crazy how they do that to u they be on one
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Nice Option For Charging Joy Cons
customer_reviews.text: Charges the controllers pretty quickly and is easy to use. Has a USB port to power the chager, which can be plugged into the Switch console / dock. Nice to have, quick charging and easy to secure on the charger / remove. Worth it for those who use the Switch casual or hardcore gaming lol.
customer_reviews.author: Cody & Chelsey Craft

customer_reviews.title: Nice charger that holds up to 4 controllers
customer_reviews.text: it's simple and easy to dock 4 controllers in one charger. The charging cable can be hidden at the bottom of the base for the extra length that is not needed. So far it works as expected and I am very satisfied with it. Highly recommended to others.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Z.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and performs as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great, heavy build. Joy cons just slide and click into place. The indicator lights work as expected. It doesn't come with a wall adapter for its USB power cable, though. If you're not plugging it into your switch, just make sure you have a USB power strip or adapter ready.
customer_reviews.author: R. Keeler

customer_reviews.title: Build quality is good. I highly recommend ✌🏿
customer_reviews.text: I found another product that I’m super happy with 😀😃😄😁 Thus far, I haven’t had any issues with it. When it’s charging, the light is red. When it’s done charging, the light turns green. Being able to charge four Joy-Cons at one time and another two while the system is docked, is a good thing. 🤫 Ssshhh 🤭 I’m another one of those folks that likes collecting all colors.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Scorpio

customer_reviews.title: Great, helps keep the kids accountable
customer_reviews.text: We got our new Switch with a bunch of controllers and went to town. In no time we were losing them in couches and all over. I like that this gives the kids a "home base" with the added incentive that they will be actually charged and working the next time they want to play. Solid base, not hollow or tippy. Nintendo licensed product.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Whitehill

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful. Charges  my JoyCons in about two hrs
customer_reviews.text: I only wish the charging cord was longer. I get the impression this is supposed to go next to your Switch but I keep mine across the room by the couch. The cord is painfully short and not replaceable with a longer USB but I simply got a USB chord extender. It's great as I can have one set charging while using the other.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Manna

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong with licensed products
customer_reviews.text: yes, they are twice as expensive as the knock off, however, this one actually works well and I didn’t have luck for the Fosmon brand and had to return. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: JIM

customer_reviews.title: Product Power Cycles and Support is Useless.
customer_reviews.text: The dock was working fine and then I noticed it would turn off and on by itself. It because happening more and more frequently. Now it doesn't charge the Joy Cons anymore. I've submitted multiple support tickets to Power A and no response.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Celli

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. I like that you can wrap up extra cable you're not using under the charger. I dislike the light that won't turn off when it's charging but I covered it in electrical tape and can't see it.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Not for nes wireless controllers!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the nes wireless controllers and It did not work. The controllers were not able to slide all the way down. They would hit the bottom of the platform which would prevent them from sliding all the way down.
customer_reviews.author: Eric J Smith

customer_reviews.title: Charges joycon as intended
customer_reviews.text: This accessory will charge up to 4 joycons. It works as intended. I bought this when it was on sale and it keeps my joycons charged and ready for throwdowns in mario kart.
customer_reviews.author: S01-X

customer_reviews.title: and it's nice to always have the Joycons charged when going into ...
customer_reviews.text: Works really well with our living room setup, and it's nice to always have the Joycons charged when going into a gaming session. We have the 3 blue and one red joycon and it actually has a nice ascetic even with the random colors. I like that it uses the USB hookup on the Switch rather then a plug on the wall. Overall a great purchase for our switch.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Not built to last
customer_reviews.text: I like this handy charger, it’s usb so there’s no extra power plug port needed, it powers off the switch. The reason for low rating is one of the four chargers stopped working already. I’ve had this since 8/5 and it’s just out of the return window which really sucks. It’s a great product...if it lasts! YMMV
customer_reviews.author: Mike K

customer_reviews.title: Great looking charger
customer_reviews.text: Works as it’s supposed to! Now we can have all the remotes charged and ready to go! Not an eye sore either in our entertainment center. I like that you can wrap the cord around so it doesn’t look messy.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana M.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: A perfect Christmas Gift for those who have more than two Nintendo Switch controllers. It has come in handy, with lights that let you know when the controller is done charging versus when it is charging. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Works well with minimal space
customer_reviews.text: This charger works great. Plugs in via USB cable to the Switch and charges the remotes with no problems. There are status lights on top of it to show the charge status. I have mine sitting right next to the Switch in my TV cabinet and it doesn't take up much space and looks pretty decent.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Bayer

customer_reviews.title: Works alright overall, indicator lights not great
customer_reviews.text: Charges my controllers great and is a really nice place to stick my extra two pairs of joy-cons, but one of the green indicator lights seems to be dead after 8 months of usage (the red one still works in that slot and it still charges just fine). Overall not to bad and the thing is only like $20 so I'm not too beat up over it as long as it keeps charging.
customer_reviews.author: Ilya N.

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in the open on an entertainment stand and charges extra joy cons easily. Only bad trait that I have seen is that when you dock the switch, it seems to reset the charging on the joyCon dock. What I mean is that when the dock reads green and the controllers are charged and then you put the switch into its dock, the lights on the controller dock turn off and then go to red, symbolizing that they are now charging.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Clean Design, Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Clean Lines and Weighty, very nice look and feel to it. Engraved Nintendo Logo. I do wish it had come with a plug adapter for the usb so that I could plug it up next to me rather than across the room in the Switch. But, that's not a deal breaker. Very happy with this charger.
customer_reviews.author: SythianBard

customer_reviews.title: Great charging dock
customer_reviews.text: I've had no issues with this charging dock. It's well-constructed, always works, and is completely reliable. I would buy this product again if I needed another one.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you have 2 joycons
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect setup if you have 2 joycon controllers (2 sets, so 4 total) because it supports 2 left and 2 right side controllers on each unit. All four charge at once and its fairly quick, its perfect, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Mayank Tyagi

customer_reviews.title: Great charger. I bought this so I wouldn't have ...
customer_reviews.text: Great charger. I bought this so I wouldn't have to stop playing games when my joy cons are dying. I can have 1 set charging and ready to go when the other starts dying and swapAllows me to charge both of my joy con sets at the same time and be ready to go for group gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda H

customer_reviews.title: Super nice.
customer_reviews.text: I had friends over and didn’t have one of these. Waiting to charge two sets is not an option. This is a necessity for game night to be ready. I wish there were joycons with batteries to prevent troubled game nights but then they’d be heavier.
customer_reviews.author: Strix

customer_reviews.title: owerA Nintendo Switch Joy-Con Charging Dock
customer_reviews.text: It worked great with my son's nintendo switch controllers. No problems so far and still working great after a long time. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ozzy

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for charging multiple controllers however it is a very slow charge. It took an entire day to charge one set of controllers. Other than that it works as described.
customer_reviews.author: J.AX

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing! Love that I can charge all of my controllers at once! Pleased with lights that show charging status as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Rand

customer_reviews.title: Never Stop Playing!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my partners Switch, now he never runs out of power and can play Pokemon non-stop. On second thought maybe this was a bad investment on my part? 🤔
customer_reviews.author: Obie One

customer_reviews.title: Stopped  working after 2 years.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this product in 2017. It worked great, and we were very happy to charge all four controllers at once. About two weeks ago, three of the four slots stopped charging. We have troubleshooted and tried different cables/outlets/anything we could think of. Nothing. Three are dead. So, this is great for a short-term purchase, but at least for us, it didn't last as long as one might expect when purchasing the product.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: A month later and it’s still working!
customer_reviews.text: Normally I find items like this break quickly in our house. We haven’t had any issues with this - and if it were to break (by user error) I would purchase it again. This works out perfectly having extra controllers.
customer_reviews.author: N. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Yes, you apparently do need 4 remotes! Why? Not exactly certain, but well worth the money to not have your head explode. Ok, my first video game was Pong... and not ironically
customer_reviews.author: Two Rivers Trading

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to charge my switch remotes because I have quite a few of them. This product works as expected and it's nice to just remove the controllers and start playing with the family immediately knowing my controllers are fully charged to get the most out of my game. I like this product a lot
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this when it was on sale for Prime Day. Definitely worth every penny. It's withstood being dropped once or twice, doesn't take up too much space, and I no longer have to hear a bunch of whining when 2 people want to play on the Switch but only one set of controllers has been charged.

product_meta.title: PowerA Joy-Con Charging Dock for Nintendo Switch
product_meta.description: The Joy-Con Charging Dock is the easiest solution for charging your Nintendo Switch Joy-Con Controllers. Charge 4 Joy-Con Controllers at a time for multiple players, or keep an extra pair charged for single players to switch out. Underside cable warp keeps USB cable tidy.
feature_bullets: Charges up to 4 Joy Con Controllers simultaneously
Individual LEDs indicate charge level for each Joy Con
Easy slide in design connects each Joy Con to charger
